name: coroutinez
description: A small runtime for running tasks using coroutines in zig.

releases.name: v0.1.0
releases.body:
## Breaking Changes
* Rename package from `azync` to `coroutinez`
* Rename datatype `Future` to `Task`
* Rename `Await` method to `join`

## Docs
* Refactor README and improve example by @bnidev in https://github.com/floscodes/coroutinez/pull/2

owner_bio: I code out of enthusiasm. I code out of curiosity. I code for the love of learning new things.
